tool_name: EmoAI - AI powered Text Emotion Analyzer
tool_description: 🔥 Are you looking for a powerful API that can analyze the emotions of your text data? Look no further than EmoAI! Our AI-powered endpoint can analyze text in over 140 languages, providing fast and accurate emotion scores for six basic emotions plus a neutral class - anger 🤬, disgust 🤢, fear 😨, joy 😀, neutral 😐, and sadness 😭. Whether you're analyzing social media posts, customer feedback, or any other form of text data, EmoAI can help you gain valuable insights into the emotions of your conte...
title: EmoAI - AI powered Text Emotion Analyzer
